title: How Russia's Power Play Will Hit Consumers and Reshape Energy Markets
description: Europeans are bracing for a difficult winter and economic pain after Russia cut energy exports to the continent. Join as Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin and energy experts from McCloskey by OPIS examine the impact on consumers in Europe and the U.S., how the energy ecosystem is adapting, and what the absence of Russian fuel means for the future of nuclear, coal, renewables, and natural gas.
